//constants
const int mxn=1e5+1;
const int MOD=1e9+7;
using namespace std;
int solve(int b,int r)
{
	if(b<=0)
	{
		if(r<=0)
		return 1;
		else return 0;
	}
	//	return 1;
	if(r<=0)
		return 1;
	if(r>b*6)
		return 0;
	int ans1=solve(b-1,r);
	int ans2=solve(b-1,r-1);
	int ans3=solve(b-1,r-4);
	int ans4=solve(b-1,r-6);
	return ans1+ans2+ans3+ans4;
}
int main()
{
	int t=1;
	sc1(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ll r,b;
		cin>>b>>r;
		if(r<=b*6)
			cout<<solve(b,r)<<endl;
		else cout<<0<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
